item.title: Good day
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: After continuing arguments over furniture, today was a good day: possible $25,000 ad sale to Rice Krispies, nailing $6,000 buy with Nestle, troy finishing caching (live tonight), mom bought a house, we're going to Florida and New York for Thanksgiving...if only the neighbors wouldn't have stolen our paper again...
